name: Henadzi (Henry) Kirykovich
elevatorPitch: Motivated software developer with strong backend focus in C#/.NET and hands-on experience in frontend and mobile development using React and React Native. I build clean, responsive interfaces and connect them with reliable APIs and cloud services. Currently pursuing a Software Development degree at Bellevue College and continuously improving my skills through real-world projects.

projects.title: WeatherCity App
projects.description: React + Firebase + Weather API app with global city search, bookmarks, and geolocation-based weather display.

projects.title: Catalaze App
projects.description: React Native mobile app using Supabase and AI APIs to categorize cats, upload images, and analyze breeds.
